doc.field: The man in charge doesn't want me to mention his name, and he's beyond weary of the label "foodie." He bristles a bit...
Superb aged steaks, house-made charcuterie, and excellent fresh oysters are among the best things to eat at this...
Berkeley's well-coiffed and well-to-do have taken Cafe Rouge to heart. It's a classic Californian restaurant...
If you're thinking Cafe Rouge would be a little red French restaurant, think different. A converted warehouse...
Nestled in Berkeley's bustling Fourth Street, this popular bistro serves a carnivorous Californian take on comfort...
Classic, rustic yet invigorating cuisine is the trademark of this Berkeley staple.
